name: Scotts Company 18221 Turf Builder Sun And Shad Grass Seed, No-7

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mix, 7 lbs
reviews.reviewText: Topseeded entire yard two weeks ago to fill in patchy areas. Did not wate , just relied on rain. Grass has started coming up just as promised.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mix, 7 lbs
reviews.reviewText: Scotts Turf Builder Sun & Shade seed is easy to apply and maintain. The product has resultedy in even, lush coverage. High quality product at a good value without compromise. True and trusted product that has become a standard at our home.
reviews.title: Premium product at a reasonable price.

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mix, 7 lbs
reviews.reviewText:
My lawn took a beating with the high heat and lack of rain this past summer. I decided to dethatch and aerate this fall and overseed with
Scott'[s Turf Builder Sun and Shade seed and Scott's Starter Fertilizer. Five weeks later, my lawn is a thick, deep green and looks as good as any I have ever seen. I used to have a professional lawn service treating my lawn and when I called to terminate their services and told them I was going to try to do it myself, they told me since I couldn't get the commercial grade materials, I would not have success. Boy, were they ever wrong. My lawn never looked so good. I would match it against anyone's.
reviews.title: Can't Believe It's The Same Lawn

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mix, 7 lbs
reviews.reviewText: Been using Scotts since I was 15 (am now 70). Have recommended more times than I can remember. This year the Sun & Shade mix and the EZ Seed failed to satisfy. After 55 years experience I claim to have some expertise. I just won't buy the seed again - will buy other products.
reviews.title: Terrible germination

reviews.name: Scotts Turf Builder Grass Seed Sun & Shade Mix, 7 lbs
reviews.reviewText: SEED WORKS IN SUN&DRY COND. NICE COLOR JUST WATER...
reviews.title: GREAT IN SUN
